overview: Akachai, a young doctor who lives happily with his wife and daughter. Then one day, everything began to change. Because he tried to forget about the past and left it. It was haunted by the vengeful and vindictive spirit. He didnâ€™t know the cause but he realized that he could stop the bad stories and help children and his wife out of the malice this time.
title: Curse From the Darkness
